mapper.select: select skill_no AS skillNo, staff_agent, avail_agent, aux_agent, busy_agent, acw_agent, inacd_calls, acd_calls, abn_calls, acd_rate, wait_calls from v_wallboard_skill
select in_calls, ars_calls, abn_calls, inacd_calls, acd_calls, acd_rate from v_wallboard_center
select agentId AS agentId, login_time, avail_time, acd_time, ans_time, acd_calls, aux1_time, aux2_time, aux3_time, acw_time, avail_agent from v_mini_wallboard_agent
SELECT wall_calls, aux_agent, en_wait, ch_wait, ja_wait, fr_wait, ru_wait, sp_wait, ar_wait from v_mini_wallboard_wait
